SELECT rsi.*,
si.code as staffCode, si.name as staffName, si.images as staffImages, si.phone as staffPhone,
vi.vehicle_no, vi.brand, vi.use_type FROM route_staff_info rsi LEFT JOIN staff_info si ON (si.id = rsi.staff_id) LEFT JOIN vehicle_info vi ON (vi.id = rsi.vehicle_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryFrom.staffName},'%')
AND rsi.type = #{queryFrom.status}
AND si.user_id = #{queryFrom.staffId}
ORDER BY rsi.create_date DESC
